font.marquee: April BOE Meeting on Zoom - info below under this banner. Yearbooks can be ordered under QUICKLINKS on the left below. Click on either ES or MS/HS. The CONTINUOUS LEARNING LINK has been added below under QuickLinks. Grab & Go Breakfast & Lunches starts Mon, Mar 23 on S. side of the ES 12:00 - 1:30 pm. Information in article below.

div.p:
To those individuals responsible for the graffiti that showed up on the sidewalk entrance to Sublette High School, a heartfelt thank you from all of us to you. I hope you know how much that means to us and how much it is appreciated. It will remain there until the weather removes it.
From Mr. Marlin and all those associated with SHS / SMS.

h3.a: Grab & Go ~ Breakfast & Lunch Starts Monday, March 23

div.h4: Serving times will be M-F from 12:00-1:30 pm on South side of ES.
div.p:
Starting Monday, March 23, USD 374 will be serving Grab N’ Go meals on the south side of the elementary school. The meals will be provided to any child from 1-18 years of age.
There will be a drive-through pick up, once we see how many children are in your car we will place the food bags at your door and you may pick them up.
There will also be a line for children who are walking or on their bicycles . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Grab & Go ~ Breakfast & Lunch Starts Monday, March 23

div.p:
If you are planning on participating in USD 374 Sports next year during the 2020-2021 Seasons, please follow the protocol below:
We are transitioning from SWAY and SCAT5 to XLNTBrain as our new concussion program. Each student will have to complete their baseline testing before the start of the next sport season. They will be able to complete their baseline on their own at home.
The flyer (click on . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about ATTENTION: ALL 6th-11th GRADE ATHLETES:

div.p:
High School and Middle School athletes that are injured and/or rehabilitating from injury or surgery can still get services through our Athletic Trainer, Julie Richmeier. You can contact Julie through the Healthy Roster App, and she can give you home treatment plans to rehab, strengthen, and heal your injury. If you've recently had surgery, she will also help give you home treatment plans.
Thanks, . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Athletic Trainer Available

h3.a: iPad and Chromebook Policy for Elementary Students

div.p:
If students choose to take an iPad or Chromebook home for continuous learning, there will be certain expectations and procedures to follow.
1. Students will not be charged or expected to pay a deposit if they take an iPad or Chromebook.
2. If iPads or Chromebooks are returned damaged, parents will be expected to pay for repairs.
3. There is a very limited number of replacement iPads and . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about iPad and Chromebook Policy for Elementary Students

div.p:
If students choose to take a chrome-book home for continuous learning, there will be certain expectations and procedures to follow.
1. Students will not be charged or expected to pay a deposit if they take a chrome-book.
2. If chrome-books are returned damaged, parents will be expected to pay for repairs.
3. There are a very limited number of replacement chrome-books so students need . . .
